Adopt a bunny

Give a bunny their forever home.

All the rabbits at Bunny Haven are either abandoned rabbits, rescued rabbits or rehomed rabbits. Our dedicated staff take care of each one with kindness and love, so you are likely to see some binkies when you visit!

Rabbits are very social and loving. Here at Bunny Haven, the rabbits are handled every day to ensure that they settle in well in their new home. They are very intelligent animals and can even be trained to do some challenging tricks!

Meet our bunnies!

Lila & Luna

Lila and Luna are a very charismatic pair. They spend most of their day playing together, and cannot wait to meet you!

Rolo

Rolo has a very loving character. He is one of our fastest rabbits and is amazing at passing the ball!

Jasmine

Jasmine is a super-soft Mini Lop. She loves being cuddled and fussed over - After all, who doesn't?

Zion

Zion is only four months old. He is very shy, but once he gets to know you, he will happily sit in a loaf by your toes, all day long.

Murphy & Max

Murphy and Max have a very strong brotherly bond. When they take a break from zooming around, they love taking care of each other.

Martha & Stewart

I bet you can guess who they are named after! Previously owned by a lovely chef, these two rabbits share a love for all things food!

Toffee & Snowy

This adorable pair of sisters love puzzles and obstacles. They are always together, plotting their next adventure.

Gigi & Zizi

Gigi and Zizi are 6 weeks old. They are very playful, energetic, and obviously - ridiculously cute!
